title: Consent Token
description: Schema for consent token objects in the Semantic Publishing Protocol

iss.description: Issuer - who is granting the consent

sub.description: Subject - who is receiving the consent

aud.description: Audience - service or endpoint that will use this consent

request_scope.description: Array of requested permissions or data scopes

reason.description: Human-readable reason for the consent request

issued_at.description: Timestamp when the consent was issued

signature.description: Cryptographic signature of the consent token

conditions.description: Additional conditions or constraints on the consent

usage_limit.description: Maximum number of times this consent can be used

purpose_limitation.description: Specific purposes for which the consent can be used

data_retention_days.description: Maximum number of days data can be retained
